attributes.action: Change the antiquated House Selling and Buying system in England & Wales.
attributes.additional_details: Introduce a smarter, slicker system that fits with modern life and works in a timely manner. It needs to deliver a system that protects both   buyers/ sellers from unscrupulous buyers/sellers who drag their heels and back out of a sale at the last minute, causing untold stress and financial losses. For example, a system with a deposit or early contract exchange or even an element done on line through the Land Registry. There are plenty of workable solutions as examples which could be followed.
attributes.background: Change the antiquated house selling and buying system that currently exists in England and Wales, to something like Scotland or the Commonwealth countries.

rejection.details:
Amend the home buying process in England to align with Scotland
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739512
